name: Semeval2016-task6
tagline: SemEval2016 Task 6: Detecting Stance in Tweets
body:
### Welcome to My Stance Detection in Twitter Website
This is the project page for [SemEval 2016 task 6](http://alt.qcri.org/semeval2016/task6/): Detecting Stance in Tweets.

### Initial Assumptions:
1 A topic, a piece of text, mentions and hashtags are given.
2
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
